titleStmt.title: Velleius Paterculus his Romane historie in two bookes. Exactly translated out of the Latine edition supervised by Ianus Gruterus. According to the reformations in such parts of him, in which the Latin hath suffered either by time, or negligence in the transcribers of the ablest commenters upon him. And rendred English by Sr. Robert Le Grys Knt.
Historiae Romanae libri II. English
titleStmt.author: Velleius Paterculus, ca. 19 B.C.-ca. 30 A.D.

titleStmt.title: Velleius Paterculus his Romane historie in two bookes. Exactly translated out of the Latine edition supervised by Ianus Gruterus. According to the reformations in such parts of him, in which the Latin hath suffered either by time, or negligence in the transcribers of the ablest commenters upon him. Historiae Romanae libri II. English
titleStmt.author: Velleius Paterculus, ca. 19 B.C.-ca. 30 A.D.
Gruterus, Janus, 1560-1627.
Le Grys, Robert, Sir, d. 1635.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M[iles] F[lesher] for R. Swaine, in Britaines-Burse at the signe of the Bible,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf bears "The names of the commenters" on verso.
Running title reads: Velleius Paterculus his Roman history.
The title page verso is found in three settings: (1) imprimatur line 2 has "EVELLEIUS"; (2) imprimatur line 2 has "[VELLEIUS"; (3) title page verso is blank.
